WRITING.TEXT:
I didn't actually really use a base color. I used nail base and topcoat Rimmel London which is transparant... I think the lightening in the photo did a good job.
And thank you so much! I was a bit hesitant about posting my first post in RedditLaqueristas, but I'm happy that I received lovely comments.
If someone else is interested: the gold glittery stuff is "Summit of Style" Essie. :)
